clothes.name: Regular-Fit Linen-Blend Pants
clothes.Description & fit: Regular-fit pants in an airy, woven cotton and linen blend with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Drawstring and covered elastic at waistband and zip fly with button. Side pockets and a welt back pocket. Cotton and linen blends combine the softness of cotton with the sturdiness of linen, creating a beautiful, textured fabric that is breathable and perfectly draped.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature. Do not dry-clean.
clothes.Delivery and payments: SHIPPING: Shipping is available to customers at least 13 years of age with a valid US shipping and billing address. H&M HOME furniture, shelving, lighting and area rugs can only be shipped via standard shipping. Orders placed using any other method will be cancelled and a refund will be issued. PAYMENT: We accept card payments via Visa, Apple Pay, MasterCard, Discover and American Express. You can also pay with Klarna's flexible payment options, PayPal and H&M Gift Cards. Learn more on our customer service pages.

clothes.name: Slim-Fit Chino Pants
clothes.Description & fit: Slim-fit chino pants in woven cotton twill with a sleek, modern silhouette. Button and zip fly, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Classic chino styling perfect for both casual and smart-casual occasions.
clothes.Care instructions: Machine wash warm, normal cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron medium temperature. Do not dry-clean.

clothes.name: Regular-Fit Cotton T-Shirt
